category.Name: category
category.Description: Use "external-ccda" to retrieve structured CDAs received from an external source.

date.Name: date
date.Description: When the document reference was created.

period.Name: period
period.Description: Filters the results based on the dateTime of event the document applies to.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

DocumentReference.Name: DocumentReference
DocumentReference.Description: An instance of the R4 DocumentReference resource.

author.Name: author
author.Description: Identifier for the external provider associated with the event.

category.Name: category
category.Description: Always "external-ccda" for structured CDAs received from an external source.

attachment.Name: attachment
attachment.Description: Reference to the Binary resource that contains the CDA content.

event.Name: event
event.Description: HL7 ActCode for the event associated with the document.

period.Name: period
period.Description: Start and end dateTimes for the event associated with the document. Document creation time appears as the period end dateTime for documents without associated event dateTimes.

practiceSetting.Name: practiceSetting
practiceSetting.Description: Epic-specific code and description for the department specialties for the event associated with the document.

related.Name: related
related.Description: Used to identify the Epic-specific visit number value of the event associated with the document.

custodian.Name: custodian
custodian.Description: Organization name and Home Community ID identifier.

description.Name: description
description.Description: Short description of the document or event associated with the document.

docStatus.Name: docStatus
docStatus.Description:
Epic supports the following values:

  • entered-in-error
  • final

CDAs are given the docStatus "entered-in-error" when they are invalidated (soft-deleted) for any reason. Entered-in-error documents are not returned in searches, but may be returned in read transactions.

All other documents are given a docStatus of "final”.

lastUpdated.Name: lastUpdated
lastUpdated.Description: When the most recent version of the CDA was received. Same value as the “date” element.

relatesTo.Name: relatesTo
relatesTo.Description:
Used with the “append” code to reference another DocumentReference resource that this document is adding information to.

Used with the “replaces” code to reference another DocumentReference resource that this document is replacing.

status.Name: status
status.Description:
Epic supports the following values:

  • entered-in-error
  • current

CDAs are given the status "entered-in-error" when they are invalidated (soft-deleted) for any reason. Entered-in-error documents are not returned in searches, but may be returned in read transactions.

All other documents are given a status of "current”.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Reference to the patient resource associated with the document.

type.Name: type
type.Description: The type of document, identified with a LOINC class code. May also include the Epic-specific document type.
